thread.title: Amber Alert Issued For Ottumwa, IA Teen
thread.title_full: Amber Alert Issued For Ottumwa, IA Teen

title: Amber Alert Issued For Ottumwa, IA Teen
text:
Amber Alert Issued For Ottumwa, IA Teen October 24, 2015, 4:09 PM Kevin Ramirez, 19 | Paige Johnstone, 13 OTTUMWA, IA - 
An Amber Alert has been issued by the Iowa State patrol for a missing 13-year-old girl last seen in Ottumwa, Iowa. 
Paige Johnstone left home with 19-year-old Kevin Ariel Toala Ramirez Saturday. The two of them are in a sexual relationship. Authorities say Ramirez has a criminal record. 
They were last seen driving a yellow 2001 Nissan Frontier with Florida license plate #ERZB06. They are believed to heading to Fort Pierce, Florida. 
Paige is described as a white female, 5'4" tall, 170 pounds, with black hair and hazel eyes. She was last seen wearing black jeans, a black hoodie, and boots. 
Ramirez is described as an Hispanic male, standing 5'6" tall, with black hair. 
Anyone with information is asked to contact the Ottumwa Police Department at 641-683-0661, or call 911. Â© 2015 KELOLAND TV. All Rights Reserved.
